amendment.description: Amendment makes technical and conforming changes to the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in the Congressional Record to make technical and conforming changes to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Oxley amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
